ygData.subject: RE: Kith Nerfed!!!  Re: Undead drops in Kithicor
ygData.msgSnippet: Am I to take this that after the patch, the night spawn are now permenant residents? Taneran Lvl 21-22-21-22-21 Bard [Prexus]
ygData.messageBody:
Am I to take this that after the patch, the night spawn are now permenant
residents?

Taneran
Lvl 21-22-21-22-21 Bard [Prexus]

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Rob Berryhill [mailto:racefan@...]
> Sent: Thursday, November 04, 1999 10:00 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Kith Nerfed!!! Re: Undead drops in Kithicor
>
>
> From: "Rob Berryhill" <racefan@...>
>
> Hmm, this is not at *all* my experience and we spent a few hours
> hunting in
> there last night. That place is creepy as hell, especially if you are
> watching Blair Witch Project while you are there! This place DEFINITELY
> adds atmosphere now and provides an outdoor zone for groups 30 to 50.
>
> Astur il'Ayan, Cleric of Brell
> SCARAB on Solusek Ro
>
> > From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
> >
> > Gahk! Have you been in Kith since the patch??? They have
> totally NERFED
> > it!
> >
> > It nearly completely light in there! WTF? Man I needed some
> > spell to cloud
> > my vision! Granted I do got my clipping plane set to max
> > viewing distance
> > but come on now - this is ridiculous!
> >
> > Ugh - ugh - ugh what are they doing??
> >
> > It used to be one of the most totally scary zones we had. Even if there
> > were no really bad mobs in there (after level 20/25 when ghouls
> > go green) it
> > was still scary - dark, foggy, ucky noises and all.
> >
> > Sylly Songsynger
> > <Spirit of the Moon>
> > Bard of the 35th song <yes still - hell hell hell>
> > somewhere on Innoruuk
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to
> toren@... with the subject lol.
>
